sentence.Network_en: Maggie paints industriously all through the summer.
sentence.Network_cn: 玛吉整个夏天都在勤奋作画。

sentence.Network_en: She paces the whole class in studying English industriously.
sentence.Network_cn: 她在刻苦学习英语上给全班同学树立了榜样.

sentence.Network_en: He industriously engages in unostentatious hard work.

entry.def: If you describe someone as industrious, you mean they work very hard.

example.ex: She was an industrious and willing worker.
example.tran: 她是个勤劳肯干的员工。

sentences.sentence: "they hoed up weeds industriously all morning"
